channel.title: Project Fubergen Client v4.4 - OPEN
channel.description:
[size=15pt][b]NOTE: Client is not created by me, i got permission to release this, this client is very old and its out of date. But this is great base for you. This client is from 2007 [/b][/size]
Project Fubergen client v4.4 [OPEN]
Features: - All skillcapes, expect hunter - New loading and connection lost bar - Jframe with menu - Music in client (u can put your favorite music) - New Hairstyles and clothes. - Nonrenamed with 377 cache - Fixed Prayer bug (freezed client, not enough) - Port and ip Changer in menu - Screenshot button - Vengeance works - More options for themes from client's icon - Note:Choosing different themes? Just click Fubergen's icon - All Previous version's features are in this version too - new hp bar - Reshape minimap [Square] - Edited sprites - Client tells, when update available - music menu deleted, Music buttons added - Custom crowns - Scrollbar fixed - 3rd armours - All God's swords - Lots of custom items, recolored items Latest new in v4.2 - Added fully working client's loader - Stopmenu fixed...very simple - System.exit thing removed - Unzipper - Updated music player - Updated Gui.java
Latest new in v4.3 beta
- Updated Chatbox frame - fixed some sprites - New chatbox buttons(click areas + writing) Latest new in v4.3 [not gonna release] - Some Bug fixed - deleted some unneeded things Latest new in v4.4 - Added New Admin Crown - Theme changer from v1.2 (Recustomized) - ZOOMER [added back] - Interface add-on: Buy 20 (Thx for Reaper) - Updater in jmenu now - Some prites from 4.2 - Added noclip to jmenu, lol - FileUpdater works now - Update From jmenu Explaining lil. Fileupdater is new update for fubergen client that tells, "if" theres new java/class files,etc for download and it tells the name of file
[img]http://img149.imageshack.us/img149/8596/kuvatslu5.png[/img] [img]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/2337/crownwg1.png[/img] [img]http://img135.imageshack.us/img135/4143/uudempizz0.png[/img] [img]http://i25.tinypic.com/uagqw.png[/img] [img]http://i191.photobucket.com/albums/z276/juzo92/update.png[/img]
[size=13pt][b]DOWNLOAD[/b][/size] http://www.fubergen.com/u.php?22
Credits: Me, Fubergen, Pennzoil,Ricscape client v8.5's factors Java got me Stoned for sprites and New chatbox frame Background created by IPhoenix Stepehi for beta testing and giving good suggestions Mr.Gangster for helping and giving good suggestions Vice for helping and giving good suggestions Java for themes razvanx - New chatbox buttons(click areas + writing)
The music in client already: Mashlin - The shore
No leeching please If someone leech this, please tell me here, pm in private

item.title: Project Fubergen Client v4.4 - OPEN
item.dc:creator: @stepehi stepehi
item.description:
@stepehi wrote:

[size=15pt]NOTE: Client is not created by me, i got permission to release this, this client is very old and its out of date. But this is great base for you. This client is from 2007
[/size]

Project Fubergen client v4.4 [OPEN]

Features:

  • All skillcapes, expect hunter
  • New loading and connection lost bar
  • Jframe with menu
  • Music in client (u can put your favorite music)
  • New Hairstyles and clothes.
  • Nonrenamed with 377 cache
  • Fixed Prayer bug (freezed client, not enough)
  • Port and ip Changer in menu
  • Screenshot button
  • Vengeance works
  • More options for themes from client’s icon
  • Note:Choosing different themes? Just click Fubergen’s icon
  • All Previous version’s features are in this version too
  • new hp bar
  • Reshape minimap [Square]
  • Edited sprites
  • Client tells, when update available
  • music menu deleted, Music buttons added
  • Custom crowns
  • Scrollbar fixed
  • 3rd armours
  • All God’s swords
  • Lots of custom items, recolored items
    Latest new in v4.2
  • Added fully working client’s loader
  • Stopmenu fixed…very simple
  • System.exit thing removed
  • Unzipper
  • Updated music player
  • Updated Gui.java

Latest new in v4.3 beta

  • Updated Chatbox frame
  • fixed some sprites
  • New chatbox buttons(click areas + writing)
    Latest new in v4.3 [not gonna release]
  • Some Bug fixed
  • deleted some unneeded things
    Latest new in v4.4
  • Added New Admin Crown
  • Theme changer from v1.2 (Recustomized)
  • ZOOMER [added back]
  • Interface add-on: Buy 20 (Thx for Reaper)
  • Updater in jmenu now
  • Some prites from 4.2
  • Added noclip to jmenu, lol
  • FileUpdater works now - Update From jmenu
    Explaining lil. Fileupdater is new update for fubergen client that tells,
    “if” theres new java/class files,etc for download and it tells the name of file





[size=13pt]DOWNLOAD[/size]
http://www.fubergen.com/u.php?22

Credits:
Me, Fubergen, Pennzoil,Ricscape client v8.5’s factors
Java got me Stoned for sprites and New chatbox frame
Background created by IPhoenix
Stepehi for beta testing and giving good suggestions
Mr.Gangster for helping and giving good suggestions
Vice for helping and giving good suggestions
Java for themes
razvanx - New chatbox buttons(click areas + writing)

The music in client already: Mashlin - The shore

No leeching please
If someone leech this, please tell me here, pm in private

Read full topic
